Due to popular demand, I'm happy to be able to announce a great new bandwidth option on our VPS's --  100 mbps ports! (you may have seen the post here from me looking input about people's expectations around consumption limits)

For only $3.99, you'll get a VPS hosted in Kelowna, BC, Canada with the following specs:

* 2 vCPU  (expandable to 6)
* 512 mb ram  (expandable to 2048 mb)
* 5 GB SAS boot disk (expandable to 20GB)
* Single IPv4 address
* 300 GB of transfer included on a 100 mbps port (additional transfer available in blocks of 50 GB)
* You can also include upto 100GB of NAS storage!
* CentOS 6.6 or 7 pre-installed... or just ask to set up the VPS and you can install your own OS! Images are available for Ubuntu, Debian 7.8 and 8, OpenSuse, FreeBSD, Slackware .. and if you don't see what you want please just ask!

Any of the options you see at order time can be added in the future if you require so please feel free to start small and grow as your requirements do.  

All our VPS's include access to proxmox so you get console access to your VPS as well as visibility into your resource usage
